exceptions.exn: In environment lq : Label pc : protocol Data : Type qnodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize core_state_to_data : nid -> heap -> Data -> Prop core_state_to_data_inj : forall (n : nid) (h : heap) (d d' : Data), core_state_to_data n h d -> core_state_to_data n h d' -> d = d' Lab_neq : lq != plab pc Unable to unify "true" with "PCM.valid_op (PCM.class (prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type))) W".
